definition: compulsory military service, call to duty, military service, jury duty, etc.
details:
noun
- compulsory military service
= synonyms: draft
- a gathering of military personnel for duty
= example: a gathering of military personnel for duty
verb
- call to duty, military service, jury duty, etc.
= example: call to duty, military service, jury duty, etc.
- gather or bring together
= example: gather or bring together
= synonyms: rally
